about_the_game:
This free DLC unlocks the Green Screen Jeremy and Abstract Jeremy alternate costumes for every character. These costumes represent the art style of the alpha and beta versions of the game, before we commissioned an artist to make hand drawn sprites. We made sure to keep these old placeholders selectable in-game for those who enjoyed them.

These costumes are also unlockable by beating Arcade Mode for each character. Activating this DLC skips this unlock requirement.

Special thanks to Jerma985 for recording this footage.

Disclaimer: This DLC is unaffiliated with Jerma985, was not commissioned by him, and does not represent his views. It is a free addition to Mega Knockdown, and will remain free.
